author: Deccan
title: Samantha joins Trivikram’s film shooting
text: Deccan Chronicle | Suresh Kavirayani | October 23, 2015, 23.48 pm Actress Samantha Director Trivikram Srinivas has teamed up with actor Nithiin for the first time, for the film A…Aa. Shooting started recently at a private studio and they have canned a few scenes with Nithiin and debutante actress Anupama Parameswaran. A source says that Samantha, too, joined the shoot after two days. Radhakrishna, who has produced many films with Trivikram is producing this film too. “Hyderabad…shooting for what will be a super cute film A...Aa. Glad to be back,” Tweeted Samantha. Interestingly, Samantha’s Tamil film 10 Endrathukulla with Vikram released on the same day that she joined A…Aa’s shoot. Trivikram wants to complete the film as soon as possible and is planning to release it in February next year.
